other_tests.findings: Minimal currents of stimulation triggered subjective feelings, reproducing seizure-like symptoms.
Multifocal abnormalities involved the anterior cingulate and supplementary motor areas; abnormalities were more active on the left than on the right.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Left temporal lobe slow wave focus was identified.

other_tests.findings: Revealed markedly superior intelligence with features pointing toward abnormalities in the left temporal lobe.
No clear focal epileptiform lesions were identified, indicating multifocal disorder.
Recent evaluation demonstrated herpes simplex virus 2 infection associated with rash on the right arm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Appearance of the eruption coincided with exacerbations of seizures.
